name: Beckton
description: Beckton is a tool for creating a new group of paying members

BECKTON_TARGET.description: The number of people who need to sign up before payments are taken

BECKTON_STATEMENT.description: The statement that people are agreeing to e.g. I will join a tea club if 10 other people do too
BECKTON_STATEMENT.value: I will a paying member of Tea Club if 10 other people do too

BECKTON_TERMS.description: An additional thing that people confirm e.g. I am a resident of Barking and Dagenham
BECKTON_TERMS.value: I work at Widgets Ltd and like tea

BECKTON_EXPLANATION.description: Some words explaining the context of this campaign. this is displaid on the 1st page. Markdown is OK.
BECKTON_EXPLANATION.value: Tea is good. We should drink more tea.

BECKTON_RATES_LABEL.description: The label for the radio buttons for choosing which rate to pay e.g. what hours do you work?

BECKTON_RATES_CSV.description: What rate options and prices to display

BECKTON_POSTCODE_AREAS_CSV.description: Limit signups to specific UK postcodes e.g. "SW9,EC1,BR4" Set to False to allow any postcode

BECKTON_SUCCESS.description: The message to display on the 1st page when the target has been met e.g. "The target has been met - someone will be in touch"
BECKTON_SUCCESS.value: The target has been met - someone will be in touch

BECKTON_DIRECT_DEBIT_NAME.description: What the subscription should be called in GoCardless

TWILLIO_SID.description: Twillio SID (you only need to set this if you want to sent SMS)

TWILLIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Twillio AuthToken (you only need to set this if you want to sent SMS)

TWILLIO_PHONE_NUMBER.description: Twillio Phone Number (you only need to set this if you want to sent SMS)

SETTINGS.description: Which settings to use (you almost certainly don't need to change this)

SECRET_TOKEN.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

DATABASE_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: A secrete key for encrypting database entries
